title: YT Izzo 130mm trail bike updated with new Core Models starting from $3,399
content:
To be clear, the geometry of the YT Izzo remains unchanged from the platform Tyler reviewed back in 2020. What’s new here? Well, there are now three new models of this short-travel trail bike available in Black Magic, Machine Grey, Assault Green and Ice Grey. Here are the important spec updates and pricing you need […]

The post YT Izzo 130mm trail bike updated with new Core Models starting from $3,399 appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
